level.text: Leaves shall be collected by the District on an announced schedule during the period of October through December.

Occupants of premises where leaves accumulate shall place their leaves in containers approved by the Mayor at their regular solid waste collection point prior to the announced dates for leaf collection.
Leaves from private property shall not be piled loose on public space or permitted to obstruct any thoroughfare, sidewalk, drain or gutter.
